data.title: Kelly Johnson
data.text:
Born and raised in Little Rock, Kelly has a sincere love and appreciation of all that Arkansas offers its residents. She has been married to Scott Johnson for 30 years and resides in the Leawood subdivision in mid-town Little Rock. Kelly has been a Realtor since 2001 and with over 23 years of real estate experience, has enjoyed helping several generations with all of their real estate needs. She is a recipient of At Home In Arkansas Agents to Love, Soiree's Best Real Estate Agent, AY's Best Real Estate Agent, Little Rock Realtors Association Diamond Level producer and a top producing agent at The Janet Jones Company.

Active in the community, Kelly serves as a meal coordinator for Holy Sous church at Our House homeless shelter, served as a board member at Home for Healing, and volunteered for Lessons for Life ministry. In her free time, Kelly enjoys spending time with her husband, children and two grandchildren.

Office Phone Number: 501-224-3201
